text: is a Japanese politician. She is a member of the House of Representatives since 2012. She was the Minister for Digital Transformation from 2021 to 2022 in Fumio Kishida's cabinet. She is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. Makishima was born in Yokosuka, Kanagawa. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Digital Transformation ministers of Japan
title: Karen Makishima
